nodes.text: Espirion was a species that included the legendary Jedi Handi. During the rule of the Eternal Empire, researchers claimed to have discovered Handi's lost resting place.

The Espirion species was created for Star Wars: Princess Leia, a canon comic miniseries published in 2015. They were later referenced in the crew skill mission "Guardian of Espirion" in Knights of the Eternal Throne, the 2016 Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, though the game is part of the Star Wars Legends continuity.
